data.title: How to watch ‘Prison Confessions of Gypsy Rose Blanchard’ Lifetime movie streaming for free on demand
data.meta_description: Missed the premiere? Catch the dramatic new true crime story about Gypsy Rose Blanchard and here what she has to say in the Lifetime movie you can watch on demand for free.
data.text:
The Lifetime Channel’s hit new move “The Prison Confessions of Gypsy Rose Blanchard″ aired for the first time on Lifetime at 8 p.m. on Friday, January 5, where the true crime story of Gypsy Rose Blanchard was told before her upcoming parole hearing. If you missed it, you can still watch the Lifetime movie on demand for free on Philo (free trial), or with DirecTV Stream (free trial).

• Don’t have cable? You can watch the Gypsy Rose Blanchard Lifetime movie for free with Philo (free trial) or with DirecTV Stream (free trial). For a sneak peek, check out the video provided below.

The film gives unprecedented access to Blanchard, a victim of her own mother who suffered from “Factitious Disorder Imposed on Another,” also known as “Munchausen syndrome by proxy”. Blanchard suffered awful abuse and made national headlines when she violently murdered her mother. Factitious Disorder Imposed on Another is a form of child abuse, and is a mental illness defined by the Mayoclinic as “when someone falsely claims that another person has physical or psychological signs or symptoms of illness, or causes injury or disease in another person with the intention of deceiving others.”

HOW TO WATCH PRISON CONFESSIONS OF GYPSY ROSE BLANCHARD

When: On demand, but first premiered on Friday, January 5.

TV Channel: Lifetime

Watch the show live streaming online: You can watch this Lifetime original movie on demand for free with Philo (free trial) or with DirecTV Stream (free trial).
